item.title: Why Is Amgen Stock Falling Premarket?
item.description: Wall Street’s updated price targets on Amgen imply a wide range from about 16% downside to a 15% upside from the stock’s last close.

item.title: Amazon Heads Into Earnings With Bullish Retail Sentiment – AWS Growth, Capex Plan In Focus
item.description: Three-fourth respondents in a Stocktwits poll expect Amazon to blow past Q4 earnings estimates.

item.title: Is Reddit Stock Oversold — Or Do Problems Run Deeper? Here’s What Analysts, Retail Traders Think Ahead Of Q4 Earnings
item.description: Reddit heads into Q4 earnings with its RSI near 21 and shares down 29% over the past year.

item.title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX Isn’t Even Public — But It’s Reportedly Plotting A 'Sooner Than Normal' Entry Into S&P 500, Nasdaq Indexes
item.description: SpaceX's IPO is grabbing eyeballs for a new reason this time, and it has to do with a fast-track entry into major indexes.

item.title: NFLX Stock Hits 52-Week Low: Trump Says He’ll Now Back Off From Netflix-Paramount Fight Over Warner Bros
item.description: Netflix management recently argued in front of a Senate committee that its proposed deal would strengthen Hollywood.
